key.description: Secret random key generated by the developper. It contains 32 chars (Uppercase letters, Lowercase letters, and digits)

type.description: Which type of file it is

mime.description: Mime type. You must process and supply, it in order for our algorithms to handle the file successfully. I'll send a list to help you

requirements.description: Which kind of file is authorized by our systems

value.ratio: whatever is compliant with makitiplus's standards
